desc: Fern and Folly is a greater Washington DC based purveyor of fine gift boxes, artisan goods and select gardening supplies. We grow our own cut flowers in Vienna, Virginia to include seasonally in our gift bouquets, from snapdragons to dahlias. Send a gift that's uniquely you, and as much a joy to give as to receive.

layout.text: JUST THE PERFECT GIFT, THOUGHTFULLY DONE.
